millsfield:images_texts:
THIS LEASE, made and entered into this
day
of March, 1927, by and between MILIS ESTATE INCORPORATED, a cor-
poration duly organized and existing under and by virtue of the
laws of the State of Califomia, and hereinafter called the "lessor",
and CITY AND COUNTY OF SAN FRANCISCO, a municipal corporation,
hereinafter called the "lessee";
WIINESSETH:
That the lessor has leased, demised and let, and
does by these presents hereby lease, demise and let unto the
lessee, all of that certain real property situate in the County of
San Mateo, State of Califomia, described as follows, to wit:
-A portion of Sections 34 and 35,
S. R. 5 W.,
and Sections2\
M. D. B. & M.;
romanip %, 8. R. 5 v.,
and containing an area of one hundred and fifty (150) acres more or
less, the location and dimensions of said property being more
definitely shown on the print hereto attached, marked "Exhibit A",
and made a part of this lease.
TO HAVE AND TO HOLD the same unto the said
lessee for the term of three (3) years from the 15th day of March,
1927, at the annual rental of Fifteen Hundred ($1500.00) Dollars,
payable in advance on the 15th day of March of each year during the
said term. That the lessee agrees to pay the rental hereinbefore
reserved, at the time and in the manner hereinbefore set forth, and
to have, hold, use and enjoy said premises upon the terms and
conditions herein contained.
1. That the lessee shall have the right to construct and
maintain a water pipe line and water tank on the lands belonging to
the lessor and adjacent on the West to the premises herein demised,
it being the intention of the lessee to connect the said water tank
and pipe line with the mains of the Spring Valley Water Company or
such other water company as may be most convenient for the said
lessee for the purpose of supplying water for all necessary uses

upon the land herein demised, and that upon the expiration of the
term of this lease, or the sooner termination thereof, the lessee
shall have the right to remove said pipe line and water tank from
the said lands upon which the same may have been constructed or
erected./
Subut, to mum lenn fantant
2.
That
the lessee shall have
the right to extend this
on two yeas
lease
for a further period of one year,
upon the same terms and
conditions as are herein contained, provided that the lessee shall
the lessor notice of his
intention to extend said lease
at least ninety days prior to the date of the expiration thereof.A
3.
That the lessee shall have the right and privilege of
terminating this lease on the 15th day of March during any year of
the term hereof, provided that the lessee give to the lessor at
least ninety (90)
days notice in writing of its intention to
terminate
the same, and that upon the termination of said
lease
the
said lessor shall be released from all further obligation to pay
rental for said premises.
4.
That the said above described premises shall be used by
the lessee for and as an airport and as a landing place for air-
planes and flying machines of all descriptions, and that the lessee
shall have the right to erect on said premises all necessary
buildings and equipment for the handling and landing of said air-
planes, and may in addition thereto, erect and maintain on said
premises, suitable buildings for the housing of any and all
employees of the lessee in and about the said premises, and may in
addition thereto, sub-let a portion of said premises to be used by
sub-lessees for the supplying of any and all articles necessary or
proper to be used in and about the said premises, or by the persons
frequenting the same, and that the lessee shall nave the right at
any time/
within ninety days after the date of the expiration or
termination of this lease, or any extension thereof, to
remove said
buildings and equipment from said premises, and if the same are not
removed within said period of ninety days,
they shall become the
